ygData.subject: Re: Lynxiz
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Lynxiz frowns, not knowing what to do. Being a warrior and not a exceptionally bright thinker, she props BH up on the wall, says a few words, Uhh, ok,

--- Lynxiz ---

Lynxiz frowns, not knowing what to do. Being a warrior and not a 
exceptionally bright thinker, she props BH up on the wall, says a 
few words, "Uhh, ok, I've gotta go and defend this base so I'll check 
up on you in a bit. Ok? Ok. Good." She leaves the room, and 
heads for the exit of the base.


On 22 Jul 2001, at 23:49, Roland the Last Gunslinger wrote:

> OOC: I'm the only one who didn't see Invasion, I guess.
> 
> BIC: Burning Hammer still lies unconscious...
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: rAuq 
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
>   Sent: Sunday, July 22, 2001 11:56 PM
>   Subject: Lynxiz - Lokk - Axis
> 
> 
>   OOC: Invasion was cool, Jer and I just watched it on ppv. =)
> 
>   --- Lynxiz / Axis / Lokk ---
> 
>   Lynxiz enters the Chivitron base, and heads for the CR chambers.
>   Trinity was looking pale, but would likely survive the ordeal. As
>   she enters the CR room, she spots Burning Hammer on the ground
>   unconcious, "Burning Hammer? Uhh, hello?" She puts Trinity into an
>   empty (obviously =P) CR chamber, and starts the process knowing that
>   the small bot will be done soon. Then she turns to BH, "Hmmm, you
>   don't look so good..." She kneels beside him, and examines him,
>   looking for a reason for his unconcious state.
> 
>   Meanwhile, outside the Chivitron base, Lokk is still hiding behind
>   the hill. He spots Windlord fighting close combat with Vampiza, and
>   grumbles, not wanting to shoot and damage his fellow Chivitron. He
>   picks out Apewing, and his twin chainguns unload half a clip each,
>   hoping to surprise the bot.
> 
>   Axis peeks his head over the pod, and spots Speed Viper. He fires a
>   laser blast, then arcs a missile at the bot. Then he crouches back
>   behind the pod.
> 
> 
>   On 22 Jul 2001, at 18:02, Roland the Last Gunslinger wrote:
> 
>   > OOC: Mmmmmm YOU KNOW WHAT? ME TOO! WCW AND ECW! YES! WWF? BOO!
>   WILLIAM > REGAL AND TAJIRI HAD BETTER LEAVE WWF FAST BECAUSE THEIR
>   SHIP IS > SINKING! LONG LIVE THE ERA OF WCWECW!!! If you Wiiil,
>   pardon me for > making that strange OOC message, I won't kill you.
>   I'm sadly not > seeing Invasion, by the way.  : \  Oh, and we're not
>   really such huge > marks, we're just trying to have a little fun...
>   > > BIC (ick): Burning Hammer puts Perplex in a CR Chamber, turns
